members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional css class to apply to the Component

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the ICheckbox interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: coverStyle
members.descriptionHtml: Specifies the cover style to be used for this image. If not specified, this will be dynamically calculated based on the aspect ratio for the image.

members.name: errorSrc
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated at v1.3.6, to replace the src in case of errors, use `onLoadingStateChange` instead and rerender the Image with a difference src.

members.name: imageFit
members.descriptionHtml: Used to determine how the image is scaled and cropped to fit the frame.
members.defaultValue: If both dimensions are provided, then the image is fit using ImageFit.scale. Otherwise, the image won't be scaled or cropped.

members.name: maximizeFrame
members.descriptionHtml: If true, the image frame will expand to fill its parent container.

members.name: onLoadingStateChange
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback method for when the image load state has changed. The 'loadState' parameter indicates the current state of the Image.

members.name: shouldFadeIn
members.descriptionHtml: If true, fades the image in when loaded.

members.name: shouldStartVisible
members.descriptionHtml: If true, the image starts as visible and is hidden on error. Otherwise, the image is hidden until it is successfully loaded. This disables shouldFadeIn.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by HOC.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Accept custom classNames

members.name: height
members.descriptionHtml: Image height value

members.name: isCenter
members.descriptionHtml: ImageFit booleans for center, cover, contain, centerCover, none

members.name: isError
members.descriptionHtml: if true image load is in error

members.name: isLandscape
members.descriptionHtml: If true the image is coverStyle landscape instead of portrait

members.name: isLoaded
members.descriptionHtml: If true, the image is loaded

members.name: isNotImageFit
members.descriptionHtml: if true, imageFit is undefined

members.name: maximizeFrame
members.descriptionHtml: If true, the image frame will expand to fill its parent container.

members.name: shouldFadeIn
members.descriptionHtml: If true, fades the image in when loaded.

members.name: shouldStartVisible
members.descriptionHtml: If true, the image starts as visible and is hidden on error. Otherwise, the image is hidden until it is successfully loaded. This disables shouldFadeIn.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Accept theme prop.

members.name: width
members.descriptionHtml: Image width value

members.name: image
members.descriptionHtml: Style set for the img element.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Style set for the root div element.

tables.name: ImageCoverStyle
tables.descriptionHtml: The cover style to be used on the image

members.name: landscape
members.descriptionHtml: The image will be shown at 100% height of container and the width will be scaled accordingly

members.name: portrait
members.descriptionHtml: The image will be shown at 100% width of container and the height will be scaled accordingly

tables.name: ImageFit
tables.descriptionHtml: The possible methods that can be used to fit the image.

members.name: center
members.descriptionHtml: The image is not scaled. The image is centered and cropped within the content box.

members.name: centerCover
members.descriptionHtml: The image will be centered horizontally and vertically within the frame and maintains its aspect ratio. It will behave as ImageFit.center if the image's natural height or width is less than the Image frame's height or width, but if both natural height and width are larger than the frame it will behave as ImageFit.cover.

members.name: contain
members.descriptionHtml: The image is scaled to maintain its aspect ratio while being fully contained within the frame. The image will be centered horizontally and vertically within the frame. The space in the top and bottom or in the sides of the frame will be empty depending on the difference in aspect ratio between the image and the frame.

members.name: cover
members.descriptionHtml: The image is scaled to maintain its aspect ratio while filling the frame. Portions of the image will be cropped from the top and bottom, or from the sides, depending on the difference in aspect ratio between the image and the frame.

members.name: none
members.descriptionHtml: Neither the image nor the frame are scaled. If their sizes do not match, the image will either be cropped or the frame will have empty space.

members.name: error
members.descriptionHtml: An error has been encountered while loading the image.

members.name: errorLoaded
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated at v1.3.6, to replace the src in case of errors, use `onLoadingStateChange` instead and rerender the Image with a difference src.

members.name: loaded
members.descriptionHtml: The image has been loaded successfully.

members.name: notLoaded
members.descriptionHtml: The image has not yet been loaded, and there is no error yet.
